title: pAmaran enakkaruLa
sahitya:
pAmaran enakkaruLa nI manam irangAmal tAmadam sheidennai tavikka viDAdE murugA


anupallavi

  kSEmam uravum endan jIvan shirappuravum nAmam unai dinam nAnOdina pOdilum


caraNam    paTTadoru kAlil pinnum paDum ebAr adu pOl paTTu viTTEnidu varai kaSTam palamEn mEl
ETTi udaittAlum un iNaiyaDi onrennai toTTu viDun adAl en tollai nillAmal ODum
